alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weber...southeastern Box Elder...northwestern Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, or 26 miles north of Grantsville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clearfield, Syracuse, Clinton, Hooper, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, West Point and Antelope Island State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front
